longBusinessSummary.0: Vedant Fashions Limited engages in manufacture and trading of wedding and celebration wear in India and internationally. The company's products include men's ethnic and celebration wear items, such as Indo-western, sherwanis, and kurtas; jackets and accessories; women's ethnic and celebration wear items consisting of lehengas, sarees, stitched suits, and kurtis; and lehengas, gowns, frocks, kurtas, suits and accessories for kids. It offers its products under the Manyavar, Twamev, Manthan, Mohey and Mebaz brands. It sells its products through a network of franchise-owned exclusive brand outlets, multi-brand outlets, and large format stores; and online platforms, including its website, www.manyavar.com and mobile application. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
